definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: He killed off the whole morning by listening to the music.
sentences.chinese: 他通過聽音樂消磨掉了整個上午的時光。

sentences.english: The country is ruled by a group of army officers.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: Wu left Wellington for Auckland by a special plane on the morning of May 27.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國是27日上午乘專機離開惠靈頓抵達奧克蘭的。

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10時，姚海濤祕書長親切會見了陸潔女士。

sentences.english: The taxi-driver had only three fares this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這個出租汽車司機今天上午只載了三個乘客。

sentences.english: I'm feeling really dopey this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午我一直昏昏沉沉的。

sentences.english: One fall morning, the class was abuzz with excitment.
sentences.chinese: 一個秋天的上午，全班鬧騰起來。

sentences.english: Crowds poured in all the morning.
sentences.chinese: 整個上午，人們不斷湧進來。

sentences.english: The manager has been batting around all morning, giving instructions to every department.
sentences.chinese: 經理奔波了一個上午，給各部門下達指示。

sentences.english: The inauguration ceremony for the new Hengqin Port Joint Inspection Complex Building was ceremoniously held on the morning of December 8th.
sentences.chinese: 橫琴口岸新聯檢大樓落成典禮8日上午隆重舉行。

sentences.english: Children take 1 Good Health Bio-Active Bee Pollen capsule daily, in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 孩子每日上午1粒好健康生物活性蜂花粉膠囊。

sentences.english: You might drink more later in the morning, to keep yourself energized.
sentences.chinese: 上午稍晚一點你會喝更多，爲了讓自己精神抖擻。

sentences.english: This driver cleaned the truck with wdined onr this morning.
sentences.chinese: 上午這個司機用水把卡車洗了。

sentences.english: The officer detached a regiment this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: A boby will be born tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明天上午將會有一個小孩出生。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
